definition: the Three Precious Treasures of Buddhism, namely: the Buddha 佛, the Dharma 法 (his teaching), and the Sangha 僧 (his monastic order)
lit. One doesn't visit a temple without a cause. (idiom)/fig. to visit sb with an ulterior motive (esp. to ask for sth)/having a hidden agenda
pinyin: wu2 shi4 bu4 deng1 san1 bao3 dian4

definition: Sanbao Eunuch, official title of Zheng He 鄭和|郑和[Zheng4 He2]/also written 三保太監|三保太监
(bird species of China) oriental dollarbird (Eurystomus orientalis)

sentences.english: The refuge in the buddhist or says buddhists.
sentences.chinese: 皈依三寶的人是佛教徒或稱佛弟子。

sentences.english: I no thing dun come three palace, so i come to find you.
sentences.chinese: 我無事不登三寶殿，所以便來找你。

sentences.english: The kindness of one's parents is greater than heaven and earth;
sentences.chinese: 父母之恩重於天地，三寶之德多過恆沙。

sentences.english: I wonder whether the so-called master under the Eighth Ground is a true Buddhist practitioner or a preacher of evil sects?
sentences.chinese: 八地以下的師傅是正信的三寶還是邪門歪道？

sentences.english: Therefore, the Nine Dragon Plaque is also one of the three treasures.
sentences.chinese: 所以嘛，這九龍匾也是陳宅的三寶之一。

sentences.english: Semarang is the capital city of Middle Java and has a harbour.
sentences.chinese: 三寶壟是爪哇首府，同時也是重要港口。

sentences.english: Finally the sanbao herself bear inner pain, to tell that the knife.
sentences.chinese: 最後是三寶自己承受不住內心的煎熬，向劉一刀坦白。

sentences.english: They do not believe the Triple Gems.
What are the tower's three treasures?
At the southeast side of Puji Temple Euphorbia melanohydrata three treasures of Mt Putuo stands beside the lotus pool.
sentences.chinese: 普濟寺東南，海印池旁立有普陀山三寶之一的多寶塔。

sentences.english: I did not know and understand why Semarang society attacked and burnt these shops suddenly.
sentences.chinese: 我並不理解爲什麼三寶壟會突然發生這種事。

sentences.chinese: 劉一刀還是放過了三寶。

definition: to supply/to provide for one's elders/to support one's parents
Taoist or Buddhist rite/abbr. for 菩提道場|菩提道场[Pu2 ti2 dao4 chang3]
used for 師傅|师傅 (in Taiwan)/master/qualified worker
tathagata (Buddha's name for himself, having many layers of meaning - Sanskrit: thus gone, having been Brahman, gone to the absolute etc)
one who has mastered the sutras (Buddhism)
Amitabha Buddha/the Buddha of the Western paradise/may the lord Buddha preserve us!/merciful Buddha!
to depend on/to hang on in a place/bad/to renege (on promise)/to disclaim/to rat (on debts)/rascally/to blame/to put the blame on
